Calculate Online Preeclampsia Risk

calculate_online_risk.Rd

Submits maternal characteristics and measurements to the Fetal Medicine Foundation's online preeclampsia risk calculator and retrieves the results.

Usage

calculate_online_risk(
  form_data,
  save_responses = FALSE,
  response_dir = "requests",
  url = "https://fetalmedicine.org/research/assess/preeclampsia/First",
  row_id = NULL
)

Arguments

form_data

A list containing maternal characteristics and measurements

save_responses

Boolean, whether to save the HTML responses (default: FALSE)

response_dir

String, directory path to save responses (default: "requests")

url

String, FMF calculator URL (default: "https://fetalmedicine.org/research/assess/preeclampsia/First")

row_id

String or NULL, identifier for the response file (default: NULL)

Value

List containing:

  • status: "Success" or "Error"

  • content: HTML content if successful

  • code: HTTP status code if error

  • message: Error message if applicable
